item.title: Report X-2024010682
item.description:
Report X-2024010682

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unprocessed hazmat box was found damaged in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: One of the jugs in the box was cracked along the seam under the jug's handle, causing the jug's contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While being loaded, it was discovered that the pkg was leaking and the pkg was isolated and taken to the Hazmat cage. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Area was cleared of employees and pkg was taken to the hazmat cage.
